definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: ) abs. [[שְׁמׂנָה]] 1Sa 17:12 + 34 t., cstr. [[שְׁמׂנַת]] Nu 2:24 + 3 t. (cases of 8 + 10 = 18 are additional, v. infr.); pl. [[שְׁמׂנִים]], 80, v. infr.:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[שְׁמׂנֶה]] card., before n.pl. Ju Jdg 3:18 1Ki 7:10 + 8 t.; before n.sg. [[שָׁנָךְ]] 1Ki 8:17 (Kt; Qr pl.) 1Ki 22:1; after n.pl. Ez Eze 40:31; ordin. [[לְ]] ´[[בִּשְׁנַת שׁ]]: 2Ki 24:12, ´[[בִּשׁ]]: [[שָׁנִים לְ]] 2Ch 34:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[שְׁמנָה]] card., before n.pl 1Sa 17:12 + 3 t., + (n. om.) Je 14:15 + 2 t., also [[אֵלֶּה]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ge 22:23 these 8 and, as round no., Mic 5:4 7 and 8 (i.e. plenty); after n.pl. Nu 29:29 2Ch 29:17; ordin., [[לְ]] ´[[בְּיוֹם שׁ]]: v:2Ch 29:17.

definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: [[שְׁמׂנָח עָשָׂר]] card.: bef. sg. [[אֶלֶף]] Ju Jdg 20:44 + 4 t. + Ps 60:2 (title), so read for ´[[שְׁנֵים ע]]:, cf. 2Sa 8:13 = 1Ch 18:12; before pl. Ezr 8:9; n. om. Ge 14:14; ordin., n. om. 1Ch 24:15, 1Ch 25:15; [[שְׁמׂנַת עָשָׂר אֶלֶף]] Ju Jdg 20:25.

definitions.body: [[שְׁמׂנֶח מֵאוֹת]] 2Sa 23:8 (so read also ‖ 1Ch 11:11 Kit Benz, cf. Th We Dr al.), + 16 t.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: ´[[שׁ]]:, card., after tens 1Sa 4:15 + 20 t.; before ten, only [[וְעֶשְׂרים בָּאַמָּה]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ex 26:2, Ex 36:9 ; ordin., [[בִּשְׁנַת]] [[שָׁנָח לְ]] ´[[שְׁלשִׁים וּשׁ]]: 1Ki 16:29, 2Ki 15:8.
